sentences.en: A redirect message, when a preferred route is detected.
sentences.cn: 又比如, 当探测到一条最佳路径时,ICMP又 会发出变换方向的信息.

sentences.en: Ability to redirect all TCP traffic to the user - mode service.
sentences.cn: 具有将所有TCP流量重定位为用户模式服务的能力.

sentences.en: Another approach is to suppress anger and then convert or redirect it.
sentences.cn: 另一种压制愤怒的办法是,让它转化或转变方向.

sentences.en: Attempt to redirect activation of type'{ 0 }, { 1 }'which is already redirected.
sentences.cn: 试图重定向类型 “ {0}, {1}”的激活,而该类型已被重定向.

sentences.en: Controls were used to redistribute or redirect resources.
sentences.cn: 采用了管控措施来重新分配资源或改变其流向。

sentences.en: Instead, interrupt gracefully . Redirect the dialogue so those you can assert your point.
sentences.cn: 你要礼貌地打断,引导话题的方向,那样你才能坚持你的观点.

sentences.en: It'should only take me a few minutes to redirect the power to the drive wheels.
sentences.cn: 应该只花我几分钟来改变能量到驱动轮上.

sentences.en: Level 1 - Gives 4 % chance to redirect incoming damage into the area near her.
sentences.cn: 一级 - 有4%几率将伤害折射到她周围400范围的区域中去.

sentences.en: Redirect local drives when logged on to the remote computer.
sentences.cn: 登录到远程计算机时重定向本地驱动器.

sentences.en: She was good at redirecting the children’s energy into something useful.
sentences.cn: 她善于让孩子们把精力转移到有用的事情上。

sentences.en: Space weapons can electronically hijack a cruise missile in flight and redirect it.
sentences.cn: 空间武器能用电子手段劫持飞行中的巡航导弹,并使其改变袭击目标.

sentences.en: The flight was redirected to Cleveland.
sentences.cn: 航班改道飞向克利夫兰。

sentences.en: The following demo shows how to redirect a user mode notepad debugging session into kernel.
sentences.cn: 下面的demo演示了如何把notepad的调试冲定向到核心态.

sentences.en: The number of redirect messages received by the server since service startup.
sentences.cn: 自服务启动之后服务器接收的重定向邮件数.

sentences.en: The status code must be a redirect status code.
sentences.cn: 状态代码必须是重定向状态代码.

sentences.en: We got the Post Office to redirect our mail when we moved.
sentences.cn: 搬家后我们让邮局给我们转寄邮件.

trans.tran_en: to send something in a different direction

trans.tran_cn: 使改寄，更改（信件等）姓名地址，改变方向，改变线路，重新寄送，再查问（证人等）
